text:
A Strange Letter

Tension fills the room; Dounia looks anxious.  
“Marry whom you like!” he mutters, bewildered.  

---

Rodya studies the letter, puzzled.  
“Why such an uneducated letter from a lawyer?”  

---

Everyone gasps, surprised by his remark.  
“Have you read it?” Razumihin asks sharply.  

---

Pulcheria fidgets, trying to explain.  
“It's just legal jargon, not uneducated.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Rodya expresses confusion over the quality of a letter from Dounia's suitor, highlighting the disparity between his profession and his writing style.
